entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Fog patches developing after midnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
